positions.description:

- Researched, reviewed, and organized factual record for an old internet fraud case to determine whether to prosecute.

positions.description:
- Investigated information security cases 
- Identified and reviewed relevant state and federal laws, HR 
  policies, and other business and technology constraints 
  affecting the management and resolution of the cases 
- Recommended appropriate corrective and mitigating actions
  per case investigation findings 
- Implemented an investigation protocol to be used to review
  relevant paper and electronic evidence, conduct interviews of
  relevant individuals, and make judgments concerning case 
  findings 
- Successfully created a case report template which became
  a vital tool for case investigation and summarizing ongoing 
  investigation processes used, interviews conducted, 
  documents reviewed, findings, and corrective and mitigating
  actions taken
- Provided recommendations to improve information security 
  policies and audit practice procedures
